name: originate
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to come from a particular place, time, situation, etc.

example.eg: Although the technology originated in the UK, it has been developed in the US
example.egtrans: 尽管这项技术起源于英国，但它在美国得到了发展。

example.eg: The game is thought to have originated among the native peoples of Alaska.
example.egtrans: 据认为，这项运动始于阿拉斯加的土著人。

trans_examp.trans_en: to start something or cause it to happen

example.eg: Who originated the saying "Small is beautiful"?
example.egtrans: “小即美”这句话最早是谁说的？
